azurerm_api_management_api_schema.description: Manages an API Schema within an API Management Service.

schema_id.description: A unique identifier for this API Schema. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

api_name.description: The name of the API within the API Management Service where this API Schema should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

api_management_name.description: The Name of the API Management Service where the API exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The Name of the Resource Group in which the API Management Service exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

content_type.description: The content type of the API Schema.

value.description: The JSON escaped string defining the document representing the Schema.

id.description: The ID of the API Management API Schema.

create.description: Used when creating the API Management API Schema.

update.description: Used when updating the API Management API Schema.

read.description: Used when retrieving the API Management API Schema.

delete.description: Used when deleting the API Management API Schema.
